courses.title: Complete Guitar Masterclass: Beginner to Expert
courses.description: Master chords, scales, soloing, and music theory. Covers acoustic and electric styles for blues, rock, and pop.

courses.title: Music Production in Logic Pro X: The Complete Guide
courses.description: Learn recording, editing, mixing, and mastering. Create professional-sounding electronic and acoustic tracks from home.

courses.title: Pianoforall - Incredible New Way To Learn Piano & Keyboard
courses.description: Play by ear and learn to read sheet music simultaneously. Pop, Blues, Jazz, Ballads, Improvisation, and Classical.

courses.title: Music Theory Comprehensive: Part 1, 2, & 3
courses.description: A college-level understanding of harmony, melody, and rhythm. Master scales, modes, counterpoint, and composition.

courses.title: Complete Vocal Training System
courses.description: Expand your range, power, and tone. Learn proper breath control and vocal techniques for singing any style.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners: Rock, Jazz, and Funk
courses.description: Learn to read drum notation, master rudiments, and play essential beats. Build independence and groove.
